name: CAGED Trainer
description:
CAGED Trainer Practice guitar scales on Playdate. 

This is not a game. CAGED Trainer is an interactive tool to help you learn and practice musical scales on guitar. (Guitar not included.)

Learn more about the CAGED system.

Feature Demo Study All Five Positions in Any Key

Four scales to choose from:

  • Major Scale
  • Minor Scale
  • Major Pentatonic
  • Minor Pentatonic
Metronome

Practice your scale exercises along with the built-in metronome. A button stops and starts the metronome. When you're ready to speed up, just crank to adjust the tempo!

Guided Practice

Enable guided practice and follow along with the dots on screen. Choose from 3 practice modes:

Single Shape

Repeat moving up and down through a single shape of your choice. Use the d-pad to move to the next shape.

All Shapes

Move up and down through each shape before automatically transitioning to the next shape.

Zig-Zag

Move up one shape, then down the next.

Installation Instructions

Download the PDX here and side load it on to your Playdate.  Please refer to Sideloading Playdate games on the Playdate help site
